\w A|strong="H3068"\w* man \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w seize|strong="H8610"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* brother \w within|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* father’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: “\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w cloak|strong="H8071"\w*—\w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w our|strong="H1961"\w* leader! \w Take|strong="H8610"\w* \w charge|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* heap \w of|strong="H1004"\w* rubble.”

\w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* cry aloud: “\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w healer|strong="H2280"\w*. \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w clothing|strong="H8071"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*. Do \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w me|strong="H7760"\w* leader \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*!”

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w stumbled|strong="H3782"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* spoke \w and|strong="H3063"\w* acted \w against|strong="H4784"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, defying \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w glorious|strong="H3519"\w* \w presence|strong="H5869"\w*.

Woe \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*; \w disaster|strong="H7451"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w upon|strong="H3027"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w*! \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H7563"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* repaid \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w what|strong="H7451"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H7563"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*.

Youths oppress \w My|strong="H8582"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* women \w rule|strong="H4910"\w* \w over|strong="H4910"\w* \w them|strong="H8582"\w*. \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w My|strong="H8582"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w your|strong="H5971"\w* guides \w mislead|strong="H8582"\w* \w you|strong="H1870"\w*; \w they|strong="H5971"\w* \w turn|strong="H5971"\w* \w you|strong="H1870"\w* \w from|strong="H8582"\w* \w your|strong="H5971"\w* \w paths|strong="H1870"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w arises|strong="H5324"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w contend|strong="H7378"\w*; \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w stands|strong="H5975"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w judge|strong="H1777"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3282"\w*: “\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w haughty|strong="H1361"\w*—\w walking|strong="H1980"\w* \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w heads|strong="H1627"\w* \w held|strong="H5186"\w* \w high|strong="H1361"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w wanton|strong="H8265"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, prancing \w and|strong="H1980"\w* skipping \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w*, jingling \w the|strong="H3588"\w* bracelets \w on|strong="H1980"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* ankles—

\w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w bring|strong="H1323"\w* sores \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* heads \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H6168"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w foreheads|strong="H6596"\w* \w bare|strong="H6168"\w*.”

\w In|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* Lord \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w take|strong="H5493"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w their|strong="H3117"\w* finery: \w their|strong="H3117"\w* \w anklets|strong="H5914"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w headbands|strong="H7636"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* crescents;

\w Your|strong="H5307"\w* \w men|strong="H4962"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w by|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H5307"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w and|strong="H2719"\w* \w your|strong="H5307"\w* \w warriors|strong="H4421"\w* \w in|strong="H4421"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*.
